title: Communication without speech
creator_credit: Jeff Spencer, George Cass and TV Ed Productions
brief_description: Recent advances in technology have enabled the development of a range of sophisticated communication devices which, with the assistance of microprocessors, enables students with severe communication impairment to communicate, using voice and print.
creator_credit_for_label: Jeff Spencer, George Cass and TV Ed Productions
